abstract: In its filing, T-Mobile, the No. 4 cellphone carrier, told the F.C.C. that Verizon’s acquisition from cable companies would place an “excessive concentration” of wireless spectrum in Verizon’s hands.
snippet: In its filing, T-Mobile, the No. 4 cellphone carrier, told the F.C.C. that Verizon’s acquisition from cable companies would place an “excessive concentration” of wireless spectrum in Verizon’s hands.
lead_paragraph: After its failed merger with AT&T, T-Mobile USA is urging the federal government to block Verizon Wireless’s planned purchase of wireless spectrum from cable companies.

headline.main: T-Mobile Urges U.S. to Block Verizon’s Spectrum Purchase
headline.print_headline: T-Mobile Urges U.S. to Block Verizon’s Deal for Spectrum
